page.title: 06RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: Although only a portion of Kilndown Village is included in the allocated rectangle, this portion contains the social centre of the village. Christ Church, the Village School and the Quarry Centre are mentioned in other pages. The Globe & Rainbow is the only public house in the village. Its two bars were recently made into one, but effectively still operate as two. It has a large functions room, with a T.V. projector and large screen, used for many village meetings. A new toilet block is now nearly completed. There is a small restaurant, and the hotel side has several rooms, frequently used by touring cricket teams. The village children get sweets and soft drinks from the Globe. The once a day bus service turns round outside the Globe & Rainbow.
